tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor felt genuine and very welcoming . He explained the case to me and my family with patience and suggested only the required treatment unlike my previous opinions that gave me a list of procedures to be done in lieu of extra money.
The doctor was forthcoming and told me about the complexity of the case and the possibility of requirement to get admitted in hospital if the procedure wasnt possible in the clinic.
All in all it was a good experienceand I would recommend him to all my family and friends with dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

Doctor explained the problem in a very friendly way and the entire process carried out with utmost care.
Doctor and other staffs are very professional and technically sound.

Today I called the doc before visiting the chamber. He asked me that he is available. When I have visited the Chamber another lady doctor was available with her. I thought she is some assistant and she diagnosed everything. She wrote the prescription in the Doc Raha's pad only with her sign. It was not even mentioned that two doctors are available inside. Suddenly the fees was also hiked to 500. Overall this one was really bad experience. I didn't experience this.
reply_text:
This is in response to youre complaint..
To address youre first complaint it would have helped if you had mentioned that you would like me  to examine you which many patients specify.It is not possible to remember all the patients who take appointments over the phone.. There would have been no misunderstandings henceforth..
The second complaint being the fees hike..That has been the consultation fees post covoid..
